name: First time making a game :)
description:
Hello, my name is Elijah and this is my first ever game. It's not much but i hope some of you will find a bit of enjoyment out of it. I am hoping to make more games in the future, i've only started using Unreal Engine so i'm quite new to it, but i'm slowly getting. that's all for now, hope to see y'all soon :)


Credit to Rachel F. Williams for the music.

Thanks to these people for supporting me:
MaxFire: https://maxfire.itch.io/
veeyoh 
And to all of my friends and family 
Disclaimer: The game isn't a virus.
